title: Mafia III Update 1.01-CODEX
description: Itâ€™s 1968 and after years of combat in Vietnam, Lincoln Clay knows this truth: family isnâ€™t who youâ€™re born with, itâ€™s who you die for. Now back home in New Bordeaux, Lincoln is set on escaping a criminal past. But when his surrogate family, the black mob, is betrayed and wiped out by the Italian Mafia, Lincoln builds a new family on the ashes of the old and blazes a path of military-grade revenge through those responsible. Intense gun fights, visceral hand-to-hand combat, white knuckle driving and street smarts will all be needed. But with the right crew, tough decisions and some dirty hands, itâ€™s possible to make it to the top of the city's underworld
